system.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets have one of their Type(s) changed to Psychic for 5 Activations. If they already have the Psychic Type, they lose one of their other Type(s), if applicable.

actions.name: Magic Powder
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets have one of their Type(s) changed to Psychic for 5 Activations. If they already have the Psychic Type, they lose one of their other Type(s), if applicable.
